effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Flame Charge to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Secret Power Gen II: Detect Gen I: Sky Attack)
effect_entries.effect: Teaches Secret Power to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
炎を　まとい　相手を　攻撃する。
力を　ためて　自分の
素早さを　あげる。

Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks.
Then, building up more power,
the user raises its Speed stat.

Chi la usa si copre di fuoco e attacca il bersaglio.
Concentrandosi aumenta, inoltre, la propria
Velocità.

Consigue que el objetivo sea el último en
moverse.

Anwender hüllt sich in Flammen und greift
das Ziel an. Er sammelt seine Kräfte und erhöht
so die eigene Initiative.

Le lanceur s’entoure de flammes pour attaquer
l’ennemi. Il se concentre et sa Vitesse augmente.

불꽃을 둘러 상대를 공격한다.
힘을 모아서 자신의
스피드를 올린다.

ほのおを　まとい　あいてを
こうげきする。　ちからを　ためて
じぶんの　すばやさを　あげる。

The user cloaks itself with flame and
attacks. Building up more power,
it raises the user’s Speed stat.

The user cloaks itself with flame and
attacks. Building up more power,
it raises the user’s Speed stat.

Le lanceur s’entoure de feu
et charge l’ennemi. Augmente
aussi la Vitesse.

vary depending on the user’s
environment.

have an additional
